abstract.para: This topic outlines the requirements and process of &productname; (&productnameshort;) deployment.

listitem.para:
For basic functionality, &productnameshort; has the same hardware requirements as the &rke2; distribution with at least 32 GB of RAM. Refer to
for details.

To use the &nvidia; GPU Operator, you need a compatible GPU hardware. Refer to
for details.

step.para: Dedicate bare-metal hosts that will act as cluster nodes for &productnameshort;.
Deploy and register &slm; 6.0 on each cluster node. Refer to for details.

If you plan to utilize the computing power of &nvidia; GPU, install the &nvidia; GPU driver on cluster hosts with the GPU. Refer to
for details.
Install &rke2; &kube; distribution on the cluster nodes. Refer to for details.
If you previously installed the &nvidia; GPU driver on hosts with GPU hardware, install &nvidia; GPU Operator with the additional option --set driver.enabled=false. Refer to .
Ensure that the &rke2; cluster is managed by &ranchemanager;. If not, install &ranchemanager; in the &rke2; cluster as described in .
Using the &rancheappco;, install &productnameshort; on the &rke2; cluster.
